Loading.title: Searching...
Loading.description: Please wait a moment and you will see everything.

Nothing.title: There's nothing here
Nothing.description: It's time to come up with something!

weight.title: Weight
weight.footer: You do not need to enter the full weight of the product that is indicated on the price tag.

pieces.title: Quantity
pieces.footer: You need to enter the quantity of the product indicated on the package.

cost.title: Cost
cost.footer: Enter the amount of the product, and we will calculate the full cost.

Clear.title: Clear Data
Clear.description: Are you sure you want to clear the whole story? The process is irreversible!

Language.footer: You can help us with the translation! Switch to the <CrowdinLink>Crowdin</CrowdinLink> platform, and help us become better together with you!

AutoSaveItems.title: Autosave
AutoSaveItems.footer: When auto-save is enabled, all entered data will be saved to your list in 2 seconds, where you can edit them.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: Sorry, the requested page was not found.

PopupUnauthorizedError.title: Session has expired
PopupUnauthorizedError.description: Please close the application and reopen it.
